verses.text: \w But|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* transgressed \w the|strong="H4480"\w* commandment, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w use|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* anathema. \w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Charmi, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w*, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zare \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* something \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* anathema: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w* \w against|strong="H2734"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w when|strong="H0834"\w* Josue \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* Hai, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w beside|strong="H0413"\w* Bethaven, \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w east|strong="H6924"\w* \w side|strong="H5973"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* town \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Bethel|strong="H1008"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* view \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* fulfilled \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* viewed Hai.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w returning|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Let|strong="H0408"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w let|strong="H0408"\w* \w two|strong="H5221"\w* \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w destroy|strong="H5221"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* city: \w why|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H0376"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* \w troubled|strong="H5221"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* vain \w against|strong="H0413"\w* enemies \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* very \w few|strong="H4592"\w*?

\w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* therefore \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* fighting \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: \w who|strong="H0376"\w* immediately turned \w their|strong="H6440"\w* backs,

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w defeated|strong="H5221"\w* \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Hai, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w fell|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* enemies \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w far|strong="H5704"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* Sabarim, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* fled \w by|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w descent|strong="H4174"\w*: \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w struck|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H0376"\w* fear, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w melted|strong="H4549"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

\w But|strong="H5921"\w* Josue rent \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w garments|strong="H8071"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w flat|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*, \w both|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* Josue \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Alas|strong="H0162"\w*, \w O|strong="H3069"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* wouldst thou \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* river \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Amorrhite, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*? \w would|strong="H3863"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, we \w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w as|strong="H3427"\w* we \w began|strong="H2974"\w*.

\w My|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, seeing \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w turning|strong="H2015"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w backs|strong="H6203"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*?

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* Chanaanites, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w being|strong="H8034"\w* \w gathered|strong="H5437"\w* \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w surround|strong="H5437"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*?

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Josue: \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* liest thou \w flat|strong="H5307"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* ground?

\w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* transgressed \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w of|strong="H3627"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* anathema, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w stolen|strong="H1589"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w lied|strong="H3584"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* hidden \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w goods|strong="H3627"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* flee \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* defiled \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* anathema. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, till \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w destroy|strong="H8045"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* guilty \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* wickedness.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Be|strong="H3808"\w* ye \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* anathema \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: thou canst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* destroyed \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thee \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w defiled|strong="H6942"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* wickedness.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w every|strong="H1242"\w* \w one|strong="H0834"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H0834"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* soever \w the|strong="H0834"\w* lot \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* find, \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3920"\w* kindreds \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* kindred \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H3920"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w men|strong="H1397"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* whosoever \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* found guilty \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* fact, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* substance, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath transgressed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* wickedness \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Josue, therefore, \w when|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w rose|strong="H7925"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w made|strong="H7126"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w come|strong="H7126"\w* \w by|strong="H1242"\w* \w their|strong="H7126"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H7626"\w* Juda \w was|strong="H3478"\w* found,

Which being \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w by|strong="H7126"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* \w families|strong="H4940"\w*, \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w was|strong="H3063"\w* found \w to|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H1397"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H4940"\w* Zare. Bringing \w that|strong="H4940"\w* \w also|strong="H0853"\w* \w by|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* houses, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* found \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3063"\w* \w be|strong="H1397"\w* \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* bringing \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w* \w by|strong="H7126"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* found \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Charmi, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zare \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Josue \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w*: \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w confess|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* thou hast \w done|strong="H6213"\w*, \w hide|strong="H3582"\w* \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w not|strong="H0408"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Achan|strong="H5912"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* Josue, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*: \w Indeed|strong="H0559"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thus \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thus \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w For|strong="H8478"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w spoils|strong="H7998"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* scarlet \w garment|strong="H0155"\w* exceeding \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w two|strong="H3947"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* sides \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* rule \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* sides: \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w coveted|strong="H2530"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* covered \w with|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* dug \w up|strong="H7200"\w*.

Josue \w therefore|strong="H7971"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* ministers: \w who|strong="H4397"\w* \w running|strong="H7323"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w tent|strong="H0168"\w*, found \w all|strong="H2009"\w* \w hidden|strong="H2934"\w* \w in|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* same \w place|strong="H8478"\w*, \w together|strong="H8478"\w* \w with|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.
